head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths DWYER, JOHN B.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths DWYER, JOHN B.

block.p: DWYER-John B. Of Belle Harbor, NY, July 28. Beloved husband of Margaret Mary. Devoted father of Margaret Mary Minson. Grandfather of Arthur Jr., John, Edward and Patrick. Great-grandfather of Sean. Father-in-law of Arthur Sr. Reposing Denis O'Connor Funeral Home, 9105 Beach Channel Dr., Rockaway, NY, Monday, 2-5, 7-9 PM. Mass Tuesday, 9:45 AM, St. Francis de Sales, Belle Harbor. Interment Calvary Cemetery.

DWYER-John B. Of Belle Harbor, NY, July 28. Beloved husband of Margaret Mary. Devoted father of Margaret Mary Minson. Grandfather of Arthur Jr., John, Edward and Patrick. Great-grandfather of Sean. Father-in-law of Arthur Sr. Reposing Denis O'Connor Funeral Home, 9105 Beach Channel Dr., Rockaway, NY, Monday, 2-5, 7-9 PM. Mass Tuesday, 9:45 AM, St. Francis de Sales, Belle Harbor. Interment Calvary Cemetery.
